channel.title: kubernetes on Ogenki
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on Ogenki

item.title: Helm workshop
item.description: Page bundles are an optional way to organize page resources within Hugo. You can opt-in to using page bundles in Hugo Clarity with `usePageBundles` in your site configuration --- or in a page's front matter.

item.title: My Kubernetes cluster in GKE with Crossplane
item.description: Use a local **k3d** cluster in order to manage infrastructure in Google Cloud, create a **GKE** cluster and Velero to backup the **Crossplane**
